column5: Was out on the river at 6:30 am home by 10:30 am 2 man limit in 1 and 1/2 hours 3-4 foot visibility water temps 47-49F Lots of fish all over and lots of boats caught over 30 fish between 2 of us in 4 hours here are some pics Enjoy FinS    Me   My buddy Joel   The fisherman   Our catch   Me and Joel Limit
Great report! Yuo eat them out of the detroit river?
Nice report! Can't wait to fish for some 'eyes myself.
Very nice. Were you trolling, jigging or what?

What area did you catch the most at? The one pic looks like you were between Alter Rd. & Peache Island.  I was planning on going out there this morning but I'm too whooped from fishing St. Clair most of the day yesterday.  BTW nice job.
The river been on fire this year. Thanks for the report.
Hey finally some walleye pics...cool guys way to go...man thats a great catch guys ...how did you have any room left in the boat???..lol..lol thanks for sharing,great looking fish pics...cheers
A great day on the water for you.  Those eyes look sweet.  Enjoy your meal.
Vertical Jigging  Zib I was out by peche canadian side
